name: bootstrap-npm
description: Example project for including Bootstrap via npm and customizing it.

scripts.start: npm run css && npm run custom && open default/index.html
scripts.css: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 default/default.scss default/default.css
scripts.custom: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 custom/custom.scss custom/custom.css

author: mdo
